crazyballrun.game.gui

Class GUIFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • crazyballrun.game.gui.GUIFrame

  • public class GUIFrame
extends java.lang.Object
    The GUIFrame defines on menu-screen with a couple of GUIControls.
